author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...EMILIA DRIFTING SOUTHWESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
summary:
...EMILIA DRIFTING SOUTHWESTWARD WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
 As of 8:00 PM MST Mon Aug 5
 the center of Emilia was located near 13.8, -114.3
 with movement WSW at 2 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 997 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Emilia (EP5/EP052024)
